name: Cyberdrifter
description: Join the Cyberdrifter team, a specialised force tasked with infiltrating systems virtually and terminating all rogue A.I. in Cyberspace!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64 Bit Processor: i5 or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
